Solution.Query: PREFIX zb: <https://zbmath.org/> SELECT DISTINCT ?publication WHERE { ?publication zb:classification ?cls1 . FILTER(CONTAINS(STR(?cls1), "https://zbmath.org/classification/?q=cc%3A47L")) ?publication zb:classification ?cls2 . FILTER(CONTAINS(STR(?cls2), "https://zbmath.org/classification/?q=cc%3A47A20")) }

PREFIX zb: <https://zbmath.org/> SELECT DISTINCT ?publication WHERE { ?publication zb:classification ?cls1 . FILTER(CONTAINS(STR(?cls1), "https://zbmath.org/classification/?q=cc%3A47A")) ?publication zb:classification ?cls2 . FILTER(CONTAINS(STR(?cls2), "https://zbmath.org/classification/?q=cc%3A41")) }

PREFIX zb: <https://zbmath.org/> SELECT DISTINCT ?publication WHERE { ?publication zb:classification ?cls1 . FILTER(CONTAINS(STR(?cls1), "https://zbmath.org/classification/?q=cc%3A46J")) ?publication zb:classification ?cls2 . FILTER(CONTAINS(STR(?cls2), "https://zbmath.org/classification/?q=cc%3A46K50")) ?publication zb:classification ?cls3 . FILTER(CONTAINS(STR(?cls3), "https://zbmath.org/classification/?q=cc%3A47L")) }

PREFIX zb: <https://zbmath.org/> SELECT DISTINCT ?publication WHERE { ?publication zb:classification ?cls1 . FILTER(CONTAINS(STR(?cls1), "https://zbmath.org/classification/?q=cc%3A35B")) ?publication zb:classification ?cls2 . FILTER(CONTAINS(STR(?cls2), "https://zbmath.org/classification/?q=cc%3A46J")) ?publication zb:classification ?cls3 . FILTER(CONTAINS(STR(?cls3), "https://zbmath.org/classification/?q=cc%3A43A")) }

FILTER(CONTAINS(STR(?cls1), "https://zbmath.org/classification/?q=cc%3A32")) ?publication zb:classification ?cls2 . FILTER(CONTAINS(STR(?cls2), "https://zbmath.org/classification/?q=cc%3A47B35")) }

FILTER(CONTAINS(STR(?cls1), "https://zbmath.org/classification/?q=cc%3A47A")) ?publication zb:classification ?cls2 . FILTER(CONTAINS(STR(?cls2), "https://zbmath.org/classification/?q=cc%3A46J05")) }

PREFIX zb: <https://zbmath.org/> SELECT DISTINCT ?publication WHERE { ?publication zb:classification ?cls1 . FILTER(CONTAINS(STR(?cls1), "https://zbmath.org/classification/?q=cc%3A46J")) ?publication zb:classification ?cls2 . FILTER(CONTAINS(STR(?cls2), "https://zbmath.org/classification/?q=cc%3A28A")) }

FILTER(CONTAINS(STR(?cls1), "https://zbmath.org/classification/?q=cc%3A30")) ?publication zb:classification ?cls2 . PREFIX ns1: <https://zbmath.org/>
SELECT ?author (COUNT(?document) AS ?numDocuments) WHERE { ?document ns1:author_id ?author . ?document ns1:keyword <https://zbmath.org/?q=ut%3Auniform+algebra> . ?document ns1:publicationYear ?publicationYear . FILTER (STR(?publicationYear) > "1981" && STR(?publicationYear) < "2012") } GROUP BY ?author ORDER BY DESC(?numDocuments) LIMIT 10
